name: Ancient Damage Generation Device

items.alias: Sample of a chemical based compound

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Ancient Medical Device" "267736" #L "Recipe" "/tell recipe 598" #L "Ancient Damage Generation Device" "267725" and one of the following items: #L "Acid Gland Sample" "267743" #L "Fire Gland Sample" "267741" #L "Frost Gland Sample" "267742" #L "Radioactive Gland Sample" "267744" #L "Venom Gland Sample" "267745" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ancient Medical Device + a gland sample (eg: Acid Gland Sample) = a sample of compound (eg: #L "Sample of a chemical based compound" "267732") Skills: | PT1750 | ------------------------------ Ancient Damage Generation Device + sample of compound (eg: Sample of a chemical based compound) = Ancient Generation Device (eg: #L "Ancient Chemical Generation Device" "267722") Skills: | CL1250 | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ Acid Gland Sample = #L "Ancient Chemical Generation Device" "267722" Fire Gland Sample = #L "Ancient Fire Generation Device" "267720" Frost Gland Sample = #L "Ancient Cold Generation Device" "267721" Radioactive Gland Sample = #L "Ancient Radiation Generation Device" "267723" Venom Gland Sample = #L "Ancient Poison Generation Device" "267724" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Final product is used to change your damage type as well as give you 500 ACs of that type. :D
